input.sentences: the trip to location was fun .
we got to see a lot of sights .
this is the neat art hanging from the ceiling .
the artistic grass is unique to look at .
we enjoyed the time at the museum .
output.sentences: I decided to take my trip to a new location which sounded fun.
There were so many sites listed, and it seemed there was a lot to do.
In one building, the brochure showed a neat work of art hanging from the ceiling.
Another picture showed a unique, artistic display of grass.
I hoped to have time to also visit the museum because such places should be enjoyed on a trip.
